about_the_game:
NONETHELESS has a rather simple puzzle system at its core. As you progress through numerous levels, that system gets expanded upon. You have the freedom to explore those expansions how you see fit; through overworld levels that contain challenges of their own.

Your objective is straightforward; navigate the pawn, past doors and obstacles, to the exit in each level. There are colored buttons, rooms, and doors. Pressing a button with the pawn will light up the corresponding room and open its doors, but the number of rooms that can be lit is limited. That's already a mouthful, but it will get much more mouthfulling than that...

Features:

  • 200+ levels that each introduce a new idea
  • An "overworld" that contains challenges and secrets of its own
  • Simple controls: 4-directional, grid-based movement
  • "Undo" and level "reset" buttons, which encourage experimentation without penalty
  • No time-based or quick movement puzzles

name: NONETHELESS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An atmospheric puzzler that begins simply, but soon splays out into complex directions.
